professional_summary: Highly accomplished Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. Expertise in React, Node.js, Python, and cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP). Led cross-functional teams of 5-12 engineers and delivered products serving 2M+ users. Passionate about clean code, system design, and mentoring junior developers.

key_responsibilities: Architected and developed a real-time analytics dashboard using React, Node.js, and WebSockets, reducing data latency by 73% and serving 50K+ concurrent users
Led migration from monolithic architecture to microservices, improving system reliability from 97.2% to 99.8% uptime
Mentored team of 6 junior engineers through code reviews, pair programming, and bi-weekly technical workshops
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 12 minutes
Collaborated with Product and Design teams using Agile/Scrum methodology (2-week sprints)
Developed RESTful APIs handling 1.5M requests/day with average response time under 200ms
Built automated testing framework increasing code coverage from 45% to 89%
Optimized database queries reducing load times by 60% across core application features
Engineered customer-facing SaaS platform from ground up serving B2B clients in fintech sector
Integrated third-party APIs (Stripe, Plaid, SendGrid) for payment processing and communications
Implemented OAuth 2.0 authentication and role-based access control (RBAC) system
Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% through AWS resource optimization and auto-scaling implementation
Developed responsive web interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript for e-commerce platform
Fixed 100+ bugs and implemented 25+ features based on user feedback and analytics
Participated in daily standups and sprint planning meetings

projects.name: DevCollab
projects.description: Open-source real-time collaboration tool for developers with 2.3K+ GitHub stars. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and MongoDB.

projects.name: SmartExpense Tracker
projects.description: Personal finance mobile app using React Native and Firebase. Features: AI-powered expense categorization, receipt scanning (OCR), budget alerts. 10K+ downloads on Google Play.
